column4: BRIEF-Tesla enters sixth amendment to its ABL credit agreement - SEC filing
column5: * On June 19  co  unit entered into the sixth amendment to the ABL credit agreement  dated as of June 10  2015 - SEC filing

column4: Tesla  others seek ways to ensure drivers keep their hands on the wheel
column5: WASHINGTON  June 23 Automakers are using tiny cameras  sensors to track drooping heads  steering wheel monitors and audible alerts to ensure drivers pay attention when using advanced driver assistance systems  like Tesla’s Autopilot  that allow drivers to take their hands off the wheel.

column4: China stocks slip  erase gains on internet clampdown; Hong Kong flat
column5: * Wanda  Fosun shares stabilise after clarification over probe

column4: Tesla moves a step closer to building electric cars in China
column5: BEIJING/DETROIT Tesla Inc  took a step closer toward establishing an electric vehicle manufacturing plant in China with its announcement on Thursday that it is in exploratory talks with the Shanghai municipal government.

column4: UPDATE 3-Tesla moves a step closer to building electric cars in China
column5: BEIJING/DETROIT  June 22 Tesla Inc took a step closer toward establishing an electric vehicle manufacturing plant in China with its announcement on Thursday that it is in exploratory talks with the Shanghai municipal government.

column4: BlackBerry reports quarterly profit on Qualcomm payment
column5: June 23 Canada's BlackBerry Ltd reported a quarterly profit on Friday  helped by a $940 million arbitration payment from U.S. chipmaker Qualcomm Inc.
